description:
UTPA delivers content, services, and features that allow you to access and interact with The University of Texas-Pan American on the go using your iPhone, Blackberry, or other Smartphone. UTPA optimizes services such as the Campus Map, Events Calendar, Directory, and more, and formats them specifically for your device, making them immediately available to you anytime from anywhere. See below for more features.

News
Curious as to what's happening around UTPA? Browse or search recent articles from the UTPA Today, Bronc Notes, Athletics, and Pan American student news, and stay up-to-date on the latest on your campus.

Events
Browse campus events by category or search for events. Learn about upcoming Bronc games, academic deadlines, job fairs, and other campus-wide events.

Courses
Browse the current terms course schedule including description, times and locations and contact the professor or map the location on your device.

Directory
Find contact information for faculty and staff by searching through the directory. Call or e-mail instantly from your smartphone or mobile device.

Maps
Search, pan, and zoom in on campus buildings and pinpoint it's address. If your device is GPS enabled you can find your exact location and get directions to the building.

Athletics
Get the latest UTPA Broncs sports news, schedules, standings, up-to-the-minute scores, photos, and more.

Images
Browse and save images of UTPA's picturesque campus.

Videos
Videos allows you to browse, search, and watch UTPA videos and content from our YouTube channel.
